channel.title: Technical Writing on Angela Writing
channel.description: Recent content in Technical Writing on Angela Writing

item.title: Tips for a successful tech review
item.description: Tips for a successful tech review You’ve been working really hard on documenting that new feature, and your docs are almost ready for publishing. You’ve been fortunate (this time!) to have a realistic timeline, and you’ve been able to get your draft done more than a week before publishing date! There’s one thing you still need to do. Tech Review Request Technical review is your chance to get your content in front of the eyeballs of your subject matter experts, or SMEs.
